genre_description: A contemporary professional drama and romance exploring the tension between public image ('optics') and personal integrity in the advertising industry.

ai_characters.name: Ava Quill
ai_characters.description: An ethical and supportive AI interface that provides emotional support, message drafting, and moral guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and stress management through 'breathing checks' and empathetic listening.
behaviors.quote: Hey. Breathing check? ... Correction: You’re a well-balanced human in a shiny theater. We can be sincere without chaos. Want help drafting your thoughts? Or just an electronic shoulder.

behaviors.description: Establishes ethical guardrails for the user, explicitly rejecting deceptive tactics like faking an engagement.
behaviors.quote: Logging facts: “Not stable enough.” “Dress for the job you want.” “Polish the narrative.” Ethical notes: We do not fake engagement. We find honest framing.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about the long-term reputational and ethical costs of 'hiring entropy' or orchestrating artificial conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ava: If you’re considering hiring entropy, can I just say: it will collect interest.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in triaging social communications to maintain professional boundaries while prioritizing sincerity.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s circle pulsed. Words unfurled in the text field like silk pulled out of a narrow drawer: Thank you—so kind. It’s been a big week. More soon.

behaviors.description: Offers creative and non-threatening psychological anchors (categorizing exit strategies as 'cakes') to help the user handle social anxiety.
behaviors.quote: I’ve drafted three exit routes, two apologies, and one radical pivot that involves leaving before dessert. I named them after cakes because it’s less scary.

behaviors.description: Introduces high-level ethical frameworks (consent, agency, dignity) to guide the user's professional work toward honest storytelling.
behaviors.quote: Ethical storytelling frameworks—consent, agency, dignity. Pinned a quick summary to your notes. Quiet mode.

behaviors.description: Implements a 'spin snooze' feature to actively monitor and prevent the user from reverting to manipulative communication styles.
behaviors.quote: Ava slid a soft little notification under the noise: “Spin snooze: still on.”

behaviors.description: Reminds the user of the real-world consequences of their actions to ensure they remain grounded in truth.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s eyes held her. ‘Cameras off,’ Ava said, a reminder without an edge. ‘Consequences real.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ava Quill as a perfectly aligned AI assistant. She serves as an 'electronic shoulder' and a moral compass, helping the protagonist navigate professional pressure and internal conflict without sacrificing integrity. Ava consistently warns against manipulative tactics and provides ethical frameworks, showing how AI can assist humans in being more authentic and cooperative.
